options.monitorial.use_global_config.too: If the global config file should be used, rather than a local (per instance) one. NOTE: If this is set to false in the global config, all instances will use their local configs.
options.monitorial.automatic_mode.toolti: If Monotorial should automatically save the last window position and size to use for the next game launch. Disable to enable manual configuration
options.monitorial.default_monitor.toolt: The monitor that the game window will be on
options.monitorial.force_move.tooltip: Attempt to force move the window after it has opened (for use when we cannot control the window opening). ELS Only will only try move it if NeoForge's early loading screen is enabled
options.monitorial.x_pos.tooltip: The X offset applied from the anchor position
options.monitorial.y_pos.tooltip: The Y offset applied from the anchor position
options.monitorial.not_in_use.global_con: The global config is not in use due to being disabled in the global config!
The global config is not in use due to being disabled in the local config!
options.monitorial.not_in_use.local_conf: The local config is not in use due to being disabled in the local config!
